page.title: 13Lawshall.Diary-8yr old Girl.
page.content: Rebecca, aged 8yrs 11mths. I got up at 7.40am, washed,dressed and ate my break -fast of spaghetti on toast. Mummy took my brother and I to school in her car. Lessons this morning were 7-a-day and Nuffield Maths and I did some work about flowers with 2 friends in my class.During playtime at 10.30 I played with Abbi on the climbing frame in the playground.Then I did more work until 12.00 when I ate my packed lunch of peanut butter sandwiches, coffee cake a Twix bar.Before going out to play, I typed our flower programme on the computer. After lunch our teacher read a story called Gumbles on Guard.Then I painted a picture until home time at 3.10.At home I watched T.V.until dinner time-chicken pie,chips & peas with Straw-berries & ice cream to follow.ThenMy sister Nicola and I went for our piano lessons.Bed at 8.30pm.
